sentences.en: a passionate defender of human rights
an indefatigable defender of human rights
sentences.cn: 不屈不挠的人权捍卫者

sentences.en: He presented himself as a defender of democracy.
sentences.cn: 他以民主捍卫者的姿态出现。

sentences.en: He shouldered off a defender and shot at goal.
sentences.cn: 他用肩膀挡开防守队员,然后射门.

sentences.en: He was the defender of gods and mankind against the forces of evil.
sentences.cn: 他保护神灵和人类不受妖魔的侵害.

sentences.en: How many times have we heard a public defender say that?
sentences.cn: 我们曾经听公设辩护人说过多少次了 呢 ?

sentences.en: It’s his fourth season as an Arsenal defender.
sentences.cn: 这是他成为阿森纳队后卫之后踢的第四个赛季。

sentences.en: One of our strikers was violently charged by a defender, ie in a game of football.
sentences.cn: 我方一前锋受到对方后卫的猛冲拦截(足球赛中).

sentences.en: Our best defender is injured and won't be able to play today.
sentences.cn: 我们最佳的防守员受伤了,今天不能参加比赛.

sentences.en: So how did you jump from the puclic defender's office to the pentagon?
sentences.cn: 你怎么从公共防卫办公室直接跳到五角大楼的?

sentences.en: The ball cannoned off the back of a Spartak defender and into the net.
sentences.cn: 球打在斯巴达克队一名防守队员的背上后反弹入网。

sentences.en: The defender argued down the prosecutor at the court.
sentences.cn: 辩护人在法庭上驳倒了起诉人.
守卫队员将球传至中心.

sentences.en: The defender kicked the ball out of play.
sentences.cn: 防守队员把球踢出界外.

sentences.en: The goalkeeper was injured so a defender had to go in goal.
sentences.cn: 守门员受伤了,只好由一名防守队员来守门.

sentences.en: The onus of proof is reversed in libel actions and placed firmly on the defender.
sentences.cn: 在诽谤诉讼中，举证责任反过来由辩方全权承担。

sentences.en: The team's secret weapon was their new young defender.
sentences.cn: 这个队的秘密武器就是刚来的年轻防守队员.

words.tran_cn: 卫冕的；防御中的；防守型的
可防御的；可辩护的；可拥护的
防御；防卫；答辩；防卫设备
防卫，防护；防御措施；防守；vt. 谋划抵御
防卫的可能性；可防御性
防卫者，守卫者；[法]辩护者；拥护者；卫冕者

phrases.tran_cn: 卫护信仰者；信仰护卫者

trans.tran_cn: 防御者，守卫者，辩护人，拥护者，卫冕者
trans.tran_en: one of the players in a game such as football who have to defend their team’s  goal  from the opposing team
